$$
\Expf{T|\vX = \vx} \eqdef \mu(\vx)
\xleftarrow[]{\int_{t=0}^{\infty}\surv(t)dt}
\cdf(t)
\xleftarrow[]{1-\surv(t)} 
\surv(t)
\xleftarrow[]{\exp{-\cuhaz(t)}} 
\cuhaz(t)
\xleftarrow[]{\int_{u=0}^t \haz(u)du}
\haz(t) 
\xleftarrow[]{\expf{\loghaz(t)}}
\loghaz(t)
\xleftarrow[]{\loghaz_0(t) + \diffloghaz(t)}
\diffloghaz(t) = \vx \cdot \vb
$$


$$
\Expf{T|\vX = \vx} \eqdef \mu(\vx)
\xrightarrow[\text{[not possible]}]{}
\cdf(t) 
\xrightarrow[1-\cdf(t)]{} 
\surv(t)
\xrightarrow[-\log{\surv(t)}]{} 
\cuhaz(t)
\xrightarrow[\deriv{t}\cuhaz(t)]{} 
\haz(t)
\xrightarrow[\logf{\haz(t)}]{}
\loghaz(t)
\xrightarrow[\loghaz(t) - \loghaz_0(t)]{}
\diffloghaz(t) = \vx \cdot \vb
$$
